objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1a1a2e;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2a2a3e;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF6F00;stop-opacity:0.1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF8F00;stop-opacity:0.0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><path d='M0,0 L500,0 L250,250 Z' fill='url(#grad2)'/><path d='M1080,1080 L580,1080 L830,830 Z' fill='url(#grad2)'/><path d='M0 400 L1080 400' stroke='rgba(255, 111, 0, 0.2)' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='10 5'/><path d='M0 800 L1080 800' stroke='rgba(255, 111, 0, 0.2)' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='10 5'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='rgba(255, 111, 0, 0.3)' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='rgba(255, 111, 0, 0.1)' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/></svg>

objects.text:
Compact 60% Form Factor
OmniPoint 2.0 Adjustable Switches
Rapid Trigger Technology
Quantum 2.0 Dual Wireless

product_details.description: The Apex Pro Mini Wireless is the world's first Hall Effect magnetic switch gaming keyboard. Featuring OmniPoint 2.0 Adjustable HyperMagnetic Switches with Rapid Trigger, total adjustability of actuation points, and 2-in-1 Acton keys for 20x quicker actuation and 11x faster response, all while playing on a compact, 60% keyboard. FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE & STUPIDLY FAST with OmniPoint 2.0 Adjustable HyperMagnetic switches RAPID TRIGGER — Eradicate latency arising from the physical movement of the switch through dynamic activation and deactivation of keys based on travel distance rather than a fixed point in the key travel. ULTIMATE CONTROL — 40 levels of per-key actuation (0.1 – 4.0mm) – set WASD for light, ultra-fast movements and set ability keys to deep presses to avoid accidentally triggering specials 2-IN-1 ACTION KEYS — Program two different actions to the same key, such as walking with a light touch or sprinting with a deep press 20x faster actuation, 11x faster response than traditional mechanical keyboards Lag-free Quantum 2.0 Dual Wireless with a 2.4GHz connection and Bluetooth 5.0 60% form factor. Full-size functionality. Premium aluminum top plate. Detachable USB-C. Brand - SteelSeries ** Compatible Devices - PC, Gaming Console ** Connectivity Technology - wired, wireless ** Keyboard Description - Mechanical, Gaming ** Recommended Uses For Product - Gaming ** Special Feature - Ergonomic ** Color - Pro Gen 2 ** Number of Keys - 61 ** Keyboard backlighting color support - RGB ** Style - Pro Gen 2 Wireless **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern tech-oriented design aimed at showcasing a high-performance gaming keyboard. The layout includes a large bold heading (`heading`) in a futuristic sans-serif font, establishing the product name with strong presence. Top center alignment and ample spacing gives it prominence. A vibrant subheading (`subheading`) in bright orange accentuates the unique selling point of the keyboard. Just below, a detailed list (`description`) in smaller, light gray text provides technical highlights. The center showcases a prominently placed product image (`product_image`) with vivid RGB lighting. The price (`price`) stands out in large, bold orange text. A bright orange rectangular button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`) calls users to action. The background uses deep gradient tones with diagonal geometric overlays and soft orange dashed lines for structure and energy.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: `#1a1a2e` to `#2a2a3e` (background gradient)
- Vivid Orange: `#FF8F00` (texts, accents)
- Burnt Orange: `#FF6F00` (button, details)
- Soft Gray: `#E0E0E0` (description text)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (main heading & button text)
product_color: This keyboard image features a dynamic RGB lighting design, showcasing a vibrant spectrum of colors that blend seamlessly across the keys. The keycaps are matte black (#2C2C2C), providing high contrast against the backlit hues, enhancing readability and visual appeal. Prominent colors include neon cyan (#00FFFF), magenta (#FF00FF), electric blue (#007BFF), lemon yellow (#FFFF00), and fiery orange-red (#FF4500), creating a futuristic gaming aesthetic. The rainbow gradient smoothly transitions across rows, combining cool tones at the center and warmer shades on the outer edges. Ideal for a promotional banner, this palette supports an energetic and tech-savvy vibe that grabs attention.
